Item ID1607

Sapphires are blue gems used in Crafting and Fletching. Sapphires can be cut from uncut sapphires with level 20 Crafting by using a chisel, granting 50 experience. When used with a furnace and jewellery mould, they can be used to make sapphire jewellery.

Training[edit | edit source]

Crafting[edit | edit source]

Sapphires can be crafted into jewellery at a furnace by using a gold bar and the appropriate crafting mould.

Level Input Material Cost[1] Output Sell Price Profit/Loss XP/Craft XP/Hour Coins/XP
20 Uncut sapphire 363 Sapphire 313 −50 50 145,000 −1.25
20 Sapphire Gold bar 400 Sapphire ring 526 126 40 26,000 3.15
22 Sapphire Gold bar 400 Sapphire necklace 521 121 55 35,750 2.2
23 Sapphire Gold bar 400 Sapphire bracelet 533 133 60 39,000 2.22
24 Sapphire Gold bar 400 Sapphire amulet (u) 482 82 65 42,250 1.26
1 Sapphire amulet (u) Ball of wool 517 Sapphire amulet 581 64 4 8,000 16
  1. ↑ Cost calculated assuming all inputs are purchased from the Grand exchange.

Magic[edit | edit source]

Sapphire jewellery can be enchanted using Lvl-1 Enchant, requiring level 7 Magic. The spell requires 1 Cosmic rune, 1 Water rune and the piece of Sapphire Jewellery that is to be enchanted.

Unenchanted Cost of Unenchanted Jewellery Total Material Cost[1] Enchanted Sell Price Profit/Loss XP/Cast XP/Hour Coins/XP
Sapphire ring 526 619 Ring of recoil 816 197 17.5 28,000 11.26
Sapphire necklace 521 614 Games necklace 845 231 17.5 28,000 13.2
Sapphire bracelet 533 626 Bracelet of clay 565 −61 17.5 28,000 −3.49
Sapphire amulet 581 674 Amulet of magic 635 −39 17.5 28,000 −2.23
  1. ↑ Cost calculated using a Staff of water (provides unlimited water runes) and includes costs of Cosmic runes.

Other[edit | edit source]

Cut sapphires can also be used to make the following items:

  • Sapphire bolt tips, which requires level 56 Fletching and yields 4 experience per gem
  • Sapphire lantern, required during the Tears of Guthix quest

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
Date unknown

Gems available on free-to-play worlds can no longer be crushed with a hammer to receive a members object (crushed gem).
